com.st.st25sdk.type5

Interface STType5PasswordInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LRiS64KTag, M24LR04KTag, M24LR16KTag, M24LR64KTag, ST25DV02KW1Tag, ST25DV02KW2Tag, ST25DVPwmTag, ST25DVTag, ST25TV04KPTag, ST25TV16KTag, ST25TV64KTag, ST25TVHighDensityTag, ST25TVPTag, ST25TVTag, STType5MultiAreaTag, STVicinityTag

    public interface STType5PasswordInterface
    Defines the method to be implemented to handle a STMicroelectronics Type5 Tag supporting passwords

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getConfigurationPasswordNumber()
      Indicates the passwordNumber to use to change the tag's configuration
      int getPasswordLength(int passwordNumber)
      Returns the length of the specified password
      int getPasswordNumber(int area)
      Returns the number of the password assigned to a selected area.
      void presentPassword(int passwordNumber, byte[] password)
      Presents a byte[] value for a given password
      void setPasswordNumber(int area, int passwordNumber)
      Assigns a password to an area.
      void writePassword(int passwordNumber, byte[] newPassword)
      Changes the password corresponding to a given passwordNumber.

    • Method Detail

      • presentPassword

        void presentPassword(int passwordNumber,
                     byte[] password)
              throws STException
        Presents a byte[] value for a given password
        Parameters:
        passwordNumber -
        password - password[0] contains the MSByte
        Throws:
        STException

      • writePassword

        void writePassword(int passwordNumber,
                   byte[] newPassword)
            throws STException
        Changes the password corresponding to a given passwordNumber. Usually a correct password must be presented for this command to be successful.
        Parameters:
        passwordNumber -
        newPassword - newPassword[0] contains the MSByte
        Throws:
        STException

      • getPasswordLength

        int getPasswordLength(int passwordNumber)
               throws STException
        Returns the length of the specified password
        Parameters:
        passwordNumber -
        Returns:
        length of password in bits.
        Throws:
        STException

      • getConfigurationPasswordNumber

        int getConfigurationPasswordNumber()
                            throws STException
        Indicates the passwordNumber to use to change the tag's configuration
        Returns:
        the configuration password index
        Throws:
        STException

      • getPasswordNumber

        int getPasswordNumber(int area)
               throws STException
        Returns the number of the password assigned to a selected area.
        Parameters:
        area - or sector number
        Returns:
        The identifier of the password (not the password itself) 0: area/sector is not protected by a password n: area/sector is protected by password #n
        Throws:
        STException

      • setPasswordNumber

        void setPasswordNumber(int area,
                       int passwordNumber)
                throws STException
        Assigns a password to an area. The configuration password must be successfully presented beforehand
        Parameters:
        area - or sector number
        passwordNumber - The identifier of the password (not the password itself).
        Throws:
        STException
